participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and creative, with a love for unique collections and a passion for winter.
participant_1.background: i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

participant_2.name: Sam Robinson
participant_2.personality: independent and resourceful, enjoying a peaceful retirement and valuing craftsmanship.
participant_2.background: i do not have a smartphone. i can sew my own clothes. i'm retired and living the great life. i had cancer but its gone now.
